title: Interpretation of a dream about buying new shoes for a married woman

preview.html: Buying anything new in a dream gives the dreamer a state of joy and pleasure, especially for a woman, and many may wonder about the interpretation of a dream about buying new shoes for a married woman in a dream. Therefore, we have to present to you all opinions about the interpretation of a dream about buying new shoes for a married woman in detail in the following lines. So, follow us with interest. Interpretation of a dream about buying new shoes for a married woman. There are many opinions circulating about the interpretation of a dream about buying new shoes for a married woman, most of which are good and promising, provided that the shoes are in good condition. Interpretation of dreams about buying new shoes in a married woman’s dream symbolizes the appearance of an upcoming pregnancy, and this This is the prevailing opinion among many. Buying new shoes also symbolizes getting a promotion at work or a new, better job if she is a working woman. If she is not satisfied with her married life, the interpretation of a dream about buying new shoes for a married woman is a symbol of her desire to divorce and marry another woman. Buying new shoes in a dream for a married woman, made of natural leather, and this symbolizes the extent of her husband’s love and care for her. The interpretation of the dream of buying new shoes without heels for a married woman is a symbol of her concern and interest in the affairs of her home. If the high heels symbolize the conquest of herself or her husband in a position High and prestigious among people. Buying new plastic shoes in a dream for a married woman symbolizes her flexibility in dealing with others. Buying iron shoes symbolizes strength, stubbornness, and a solid personality, while glass symbolizes his precision and concern for time and value. Buying copper shoes indicates her purity. And her chastity, but if it is made of wood, it symbolizes her love for family life. As for buying new golden shoes in a dream for a married woman, it symbolizes her prosperity and the life of luxury and luxury that she enjoys. See also: A dream about white high heels, a dream about losing shoes and wearing another shoe. Watch the video interpretation of a dream Buying new shoes for a married woman: In the end, we talked with you in detail about the interpretation of the dream of buying new shoes for a married woman, and we are happy for you to communicate with us through comments and send your dreams for translation as quickly as possible.

title: The meaning of the name Nouran and the characteristics that bear it 2022

preview.html: Nouran is a feminine and masculine name used in both the Arab and Western worlds, and its meaning varies from country to country and from language to language. The meaning of the name Nouran and the characteristics that bear this name The meaning of the name Nouran Nouran is a name of Arabic origin derived from the Arabic word “Noor” which means “light” and “light” is one of the ninety-nine names of God Almighty. Nouran is the double word “light”, and it refers to the two or double lamps, meaning that the light is getting stronger. The meaning of the name Nouran and the characteristics that bear this name The decision to name Nouran Nouran is an adoptable name. Because it comes from an Arabic word mentioned in the Holy Qur’an (light) and it refers to beautiful and not offensive concepts known to the Arab community. Characteristics of the name Nouran People named Nouran have an attractive personality and are open and full of ambition and perfection in everything. Nouran has a soft and sensitive nature, she is romantic and honest with her loved ones, she loves to express herself and is easily attracted to anyone. Nouran feels lucky and happy. She is always looking for fun and laughter, traveling to faraway places and is open to trying new things. The meaning of the name Nouran and the recipes that bear this name Analysis of the name Nouran Each letter of the name Nouran represents meanings that can be interpreted and do not necessarily determine the personality of its bearer, but they help in giving an overview and analyzing the letters of the name Nouran as follows: N: A creative and innovative person who tends to think outside the box, has a strong will, loves to learn from his experiences and thinks creatively in life. W: These people have the ability to adapt and make decisions at a fast pace and devote their entire lives to achieving their goals. R: A practical person who can perform his job in an excellent manner, can be a good leader who can maintain harmony in the work group. A: An ambitious and free-thinking person who does not change his mind under pressure, and this makes him a natural leader, who wants to be responsible and control those around her. W

title: Interpretation of a dream about divorce for engaged couples in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about divorce for those who dream Here we learn about the most important interpretations that talk about seeing divorce for those who dream. Let us know. Interpretation of a dream about divorce for a dreamer. Seeing divorce for someone who gets married is a sign of the good that will happen to her. The fiancée saw that her fiancé had divorced her as a sign of salvation from sin and poverty. The fiancée saw In a dream, her fiancé has divorced her, indicating that she will encounter many problems and crises in the future, but she will overcome them. When she sees the divorce of the fiancée, this is evidence of the approaching marriage. Interpretation of a dream about my sister’s divorce in a dream: If a girl sees that her sister is divorced in a dream, this means that she She will have friends soon. Seeing my sister divorced from her husband in a dream is evidence of the wealth and goodness that her sister will receive. A man divorces his sister in a dream, a sign of leaving a job or business. Seeing a brother and sister in a dream is a sign that he is going through a very difficult period of problems and worries But he will get rid of her soon. Interpretation of a dream about my girlfriend’s divorce: Seeing a friend’s divorce in a dream is a sign of many quarrels in her life. If a girl sees that her boyfriend has divorced in a dream, this means that she will get rid of problems and begin a happy life. A girl’s divorce in a dream is considered a sign of Great joy for her. Seeing a girl who was introduced to her by her boyfriend and broke up in a dream is evidence that she is suffering from some stress and problems, but she will get rid of it soon. I dreamed that my husband divorced me and I was crying. Seeing divorce in a dream is a sign that the wife loves her husband very much. For a woman to see that Her husband divorcing her in a dream is evidence that she is facing a big problem in her life. If someone sees that he is divorcing his wife in a dream, this is a sign that he will lose his job or partnership. If a woman sees that her husband has divorced her in a dream, this is evidence that she is earning a living. And a lot of money that you will have soon. Seeing divorce in a dream is a sign of recovery from illness. If a wife sees that her husband has divorced her three times, this is a sign of death and one of them almost died. Interpretation of a dream about divorce for a married woman and marrying another woman. Seeing a wife that her husband has Divorcing her and remarrying her is another sign of differences and judgments between her and her husband. Divorced and married to her husband, and her marriage to another man is an indication of the difficulties and problems she faces. A married woman saw that her husband had divorced her permanently and she married another, and this is evidence of the positive changes that will occur in her life. Seeing divorce in The dream is a sign of comfort and happiness coming to the one who has the vision. Interpretation of a dream about divorce for relatives: Seeing the divorce of relatives is a sign of problems between them. For a person to see in a dream that his relatives are separated, this is a sign of the dreamer’s hidden secrets. If someone sees the divorce of relatives in a dream, this indicates There are some problems with them. Seeing the divorce of relatives in a dream is a sign of disagreements, problems, hatred and envy between them. The divorce of relatives in a dream is a warning sign that the dreamer must beware of them. I dreamed that my husband divorced me and he was crying. Seeing divorce in a dream is a sign

title: Interpretation of seeing a jug in a dream for a married and single woman

preview.html: Ladies and gentlemen, hello and welcome to all of you on the Dream Interpretation website. In this meeting, we will learn about the interpretation of seeing a thrower in a dream through what was mentioned by the great translator Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi. Likewise, through what Imam Al-Sadiq mentioned in his explanation of seeing a jug, we also have in this article a detailed explanation of a jug in a dream for single women, married women, pregnant women, and men as well. We wish everyone a good and useful continuation, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a jug in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. The jug was mentioned in the book (Ta’ir al-Anam fi Interpretation of Dreams) by Sheikh Abd al-Ghani al-Nabulsi, where he said in his interpretation: A jug in a dream shows repentance for sins in a dream. A pregnant woman has a male child. In the dream jug, a man or young man appears who knows secrets or knowledge. As for the large number of jugs in a dream, it is an indication of the good deeds that may allow its owner to enter Paradise in this way (honoring one’s parents, paying zakat, establishing prayer, etc.). Sometimes the jug is a symbol of the sword because it is one of its names, as stated in the Al-Wasit dictionary: The jug is the shining sword, The jug sometimes refers to a beautiful woman with shiny skin. The higher the value of the jug in a dream, this indicates the high rank of the dreamer, and the best jugs in dreams are those made of silver or gold. Almost all commentators unanimously agree that the jug in a dream can indicate To laughter or fun, and this interpretation applies to most similar vessels. Interpretation of seeing a jug in a dream by Imam Jaafar Al-Sadiq. Imam Jaafar Al-Sadiq, may God have mercy on him, said: (The jug has eleven interpretations in the interpretation, and sometimes it symbolizes a woman, and sometimes it symbolizes a faithful servant). Jugs may also indicate inheritance on the part of the woman, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a jug in one dream: A jug in an unmarried woman’s dream is one of the symbols that have a positive meaning in the dream, especially if this jug is made of silver or glass or contains a good drink such as tea or a drink. Which unmarried women love. Get alert. The jug in an unmarried woman’s dream may indicate a young man of good character and religion, and it may also indicate money if she dreams of pouring its contents into cups or mugs. It is a good interpretation to see the woman in her dream as owning ceramic pots or a jug. Glass, it may represent owning something of moral or material value, provided that the jug in the dream appears free of the ring. And the throat and confusion without impurities and pus. Interpretation of seeing a jug in a dream for a married woman: The jug in a married woman’s dream sometimes symbolizes a man, and in many cases the jug symbolizes a good boy. The best jugs in a married woman’s dream are those made of silver, glass, or pottery. If a married woman sees that she is pouring coffee from a pot, this is her interpretation of salvation from problems and worries. If he sees that he is pouring tea, this is a good relationship, God willing. This drink should not be dark in color. The jug may indicate...

title: Interpretation of seeing the queen in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing the queen in a dream is one of the interpretations that the people of this dream are looking for, because they feel proud because they met some kings and sad because they met others, because kings are public figures. Many people want to collect data about them and know their news directly, but is it good to meet them or see them in a dream? You might be interested: Talking with the dead in a dreamInterpretation of seeing the Queen in a dreamInterpretation of seeing the Queen in a dreamThe dream of the Queen has beautiful interpretations, which are: It symbolizes the success of the owner’s projects if he sees the strong young queen, but if the queen is weak or old, this means social events Unpleasant. If the dream is about a real queen, it indicates influence, personal growth, strength, and intuition. A smiling queen in a dream is a symbol of a mother, and this means that the dreamer needs or lacks his mother. Success in future projects and a successful marriage. Living with money and a happy life with family And the restoration of lost rights. Seeing a dead queen means the return of someone who has been absent for a long time. If the queen’s appearance in a dream is ugly, this means sad social situations that will happen to the pioneer. You may also be interested in: Pumpkins in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the queen in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin saw that The interpretation of seeing a queen in a dream is: The dreamer’s mind has matured. The power of the girl in her life if the dreamer is a girl. Strength of character and enjoyment of acceptance in life. Good soon for the ladies who see this dream. The need to see a mother in life. If the girl sees herself as a queen in the dream. This means that she will occupy a higher position in her work and that she will have a great influence in her family and in her public life. The dreamer who receives the throne and wears the crown indicates that she will achieve her ambitions. The dreamer’s transformation into a queen in her dream means success in her public life. The girl who sees that she She became a queen in her dream and she is happy with that. She will have good luck in the future. A dead queen in a dream means an inability to realize dreams and aspirations, but it indicates that the dreamer will have a lot of goodness soon. A dead queen in a dream symbolizes success in proving the dreamer’s innocence in Some things. To dream that we are exchanging hands with a queen means that the dreamer will rise in status and recover soon. To dream that you are sitting with a queen means abundant wealth and a lot of sustenance that the dreamer will obtain. The queen in a woman or girl’s dream symbolizes the vanity that will affect her. Or she is not interested in all the opinions around her. A lady or girl in a dream seeking to become a queen means that she is trying to gain influence and power. A sad queen symbolizes a delay in realizing desires. A queen who wears dirty clothes in a dream is a sign of unpleasant news in the coming period. The old queen in a dream symbolizes failure, and if the dreamer sees an unpleasant queen, this means that he will suffer from problems. You may also be interested in the following: I saw my husband getting marriedOther indicators of

title: Interpretation of a righteous man in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a good man in a dream in different situations, whether good or bad, as dreams are considered one of the first things that cause confusion for a person and he always searches for interpretations of his dream that emanate from the subconscious or subconscious mind, and the interpretation of dreams in religion delves into the meaning of the dream in detail, because they believe that the dream or As they say, a vision is a message either divine or satanic, meaning that it is intended for the dreamer to understand it, so the dreamer turns to people who have the ability and talent to understand the dream and wait for them to interpret the message and direct him what should be done to reassure him. We will present this in the encyclopedia now... Interpretation of a righteous man in a dream: If there is a righteous man speaking to you about something during the dream: This is a divine message warning the dreamer to stop the sins and disobedience he is committing and to stay away from everything that contradicts God. If the dream is about a man wearing white :This means that he is one of the angels, and if he wants white and with a white beard, this means that he is a prophet, and this indicates that the dreamer is a good man and a believer. If the dream is of a nice man kissing you: This is also a message that means that God will protect you from all evil and that God will prevent you from Evil and people who will harm you and that you are a good and kind person who loves you all. If the dream is that the girl in a dream marries a man who is religiously righteous: This means that good intentions will prevail over her, and you will be among the righteous and righteous, and you will gain fame and money. If the dream is that there is a good old man and he appears during Dreaming at an early age: This means that it will bring you many good deeds in this world, a peaceful life and also money. If the dream is that the dreamer saw himself in the dream as a religious man: One who considers himself righteous and benefits people with his knowledge, and others turn to him in matters of their religion and take Advising him, this means that he is worried, and troubles are coming to him, so he should avoid it and be reasonable. Calm and just. If the dream is that there is a righteous man in an unseemly country: If the dreamer sees a righteous man in a country or place where there are troubles and misfortunes that have struck the people of the country, this means that the misfortunes will end and everything will be fine. If the dreamer is an unmarried girl, she dreamed With a good man: This appearance is a sign of justice, wisdom, and prudence, and it is a dream that is good news, meaning soon livelihood, a good husband, good children, a successful religious life, and success in the life of this world as well. If the dreamer is a pregnant woman: This means a lot of goodness and significance. The birth of Sharif’s son is near, and it also indicates the stability of marital life and the dreamer will enjoy a happy married life. Interpretation of a cleric in a dream by Ibn Shaheen: This indicates that this dreamer will enjoy life and be the best of people, and kindness and blessings await him on his way, and he will enjoy the love of people and be a good human being. Intelligent, with an open mind and an expansive mind. It also indicates that the dreamer’s life will be filled with happiness and joy and that this person is happy psychologically and morally. This person is knowledgeable and rich in religion, which makes him advise others on what they need regarding matters of their religious life. He is a religiously educated man, aware of the truth of what he says. Who taught him. As a

If the dream is that the girl in a dream marries a man who is religiously righteous: This means that good intentions will prevail over her, and you will be among the righteous and righteous, and you will gain fame and money. If the dream is that there is a good old man and he appears during Dreaming at an early age: This means that it will bring you many good deeds in this world, a peaceful life and also money. If the dream is that the dreamer saw himself in the dream as a religious man: One who considers himself righteous and benefits people with his knowledge, and others turn to him in matters of their religion and take Advising him, this means that he is worried, and troubles are coming to him, so he should avoid it and be reasonable. Calm and just. If the dream is that there is a righteous man in an unseemly country: If the dreamer sees a righteous man in a country or place where there are troubles and misfortunes that have struck the people of the country, this means that the misfortunes will end and everything will be fine. If the dreamer is an unmarried girl, she dreamed With a good man: This appearance is a sign of justice, wisdom, and prudence, and it is a dream that is good news, meaning soon livelihood, a good husband, good children, a successful religious life, and success in the life of this world as well. If the dreamer is a pregnant woman: This means a lot of goodness and significance. The birth of Sharif’s son is near, and it also indicates the stability of marital life and the dreamer will enjoy a happy married life. Interpretation of a cleric in a dream by Ibn Shaheen: This indicates that this dreamer will enjoy life and be the best of people, and kindness and blessings await him on his way, and he will enjoy the love of people and be a good human being. Intelligent, with an open mind and an expansive mind. It also indicates that the dreamer’s life will be filled with happiness and joy and that this person is happy psychologically and morally. This person is knowledgeable and rich in religion, which makes him advise others on what they need regarding matters of their religious life. He is a religiously educated man, aware of the truth of what he says. Who taught him. As a

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pillow in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pillow in a dream. The pillow is a cloth bag with a bag of cotton, fiber, sponge, or any other type of cloth bag to make you feel comfortable when sleeping. There are many different shapes and types of pillows, including car airbags in a dream, which can mean marriage to a young man. And a girl, because it indicates the dreamer’s happiness and stability, as well as the marriage of a young man and a girl, as well as a secure life and job stability. The dream of seeing a pillow by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained the interpretation of seeing a pillow in a dream because it symbolizes children as well as the world. Seeing a dreamer on a large pillow means good luck and wealth. A dream about buying a pillow indicates that you will get married soon. Seeing bad pillows means stress and trouble. A dream about seeing a pillow for single people When she saw someone buying a pillow or pillow in her dream, it meant a good friendship between her and her friends. Seeing a pillow in a dream for an unmarried woman means a source of livelihood, wealth and peace Seeing pillows falling or being torn indicates worry and anxiety. Or when you see that they are selling pillows, this indicates harm and damage to the viewer. Seeing a white pillow and it seems to be popular in people’s medical reputation. Seeing pink pillows means the arrival of happiness and wealth. Seeing a silk pillow indicates On her marriage to a rich man. Seeing a woolen pillow indicates how close you are to God Almighty. Dreaming of seeing a pillow for a married woman: You saw in a dream a married woman who wants a pillow, this indicates that she has sons and daughters. Seeing a blue pillow indicates the arrival of abundant sustenance and money. Seeing a green pillow indicates that she and her husband are traveling to another country. For a married woman, dreaming of white pillows is evidence of her happiness, her love for her husband, and the strong bond between them. Seeing a married woman dreams of buying pillows, so her good skin is also good news. Dreaming of seeing a pillow for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman with a pillow indicates White or pink color indicates the birth of a girl. Seeing a pregnant woman on a blue pillow means the birth of a boy. Seeing many pillows in a dream means that there are many children and grandchildren. I saw only two bags in my dream, and this is evidence of the birth of twins in a pregnant woman. The righteous. A pious girl. If the pillow is red, it means that he will marry a divorced widow. Someone gave me pillows. Seeing pillows in a dream means marriage or children. If an unmarried young man sees that he is sleeping on a pillow, this indicates that his marriage is approaching. Likewise, if an unmarried woman sees that, this indicates that her marriage is approaching. Seeing pillows in a married woman’s dream means that she will have a number of children like the pillows she saw. Seeing a dead man giving a pillow to an unmarried young man is evidence that his marriage is approaching. If a married woman sees a dead person giving her a pillow, this means that she will become pregnant soon. Dreaming of seeing a pillow in

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dog crying in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of a dog crying in a dream In case you want to know the interpretation of a dream of a dog crying in a dream, it is one of the disturbing dreams for which the dreamer wants to know an interpretation, but he must be careful about that. The interpretations are the interpretations of interpretation scholars and the site managers have nothing to do with them, so you should be careful and do not completely believe these interpretations. Interpretation of a dream of a dog crying in a dream: A dog crying in a dream can indicate the distress and sadness that a person feels. Seeing a dog crying may indicate The tension that the dreamer felt during those days. Seeing a dog in a dream may indicate a financial crisis that the dreamer may face during this time. If one sees that the dog was crying, this may be an indication of the dreamer’s fear of God Almighty, and he must ask forgiveness. Interpretation of a dream Hearing dogs in a dream Anyone who dreams that dogs are barking may indicate that they have not listened to advice and that they should listen. If one sees that dogs were barking loudly, this may indicate hatred or hostility that the dreamer may face. Dreaming of hearing the sound of dogs in a dream A sign that may indicate the presence of an enemy near him and he must be careful. Interpretation of a dream about stealing a dog in a dream: Stealing a dog in a dream may indicate the loss of some important things from the dreamer’s life. Whoever dreams that he stole the dog may indicate financial distress that he may be exposed to and that he will overcome. It may Seeing dogs being stolen in a dream indicates some family problems that the dreamer may face during those days. If the person sees that he has stolen the dog, this may indicate his good condition and the positive changes that have occurred to him during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about selling dogs in A dream: Anyone who dreams of buying a dog may indicate a material loss that the dreamer may suffer in his business. Dreaming of selling a dog in a dream may indicate changes in his life during these days. In the event that one sees that he is selling a dog, this may indicate damage that may be suffered. It has the owner of the vision who will overcome it with the grace of God. In the event that one sees that he is selling the dog, this may indicate happy events that will come his way in the coming period, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about dog excrement in a dream: Seeing dog excrement in a dream may indicate the presence of enemies surrounding The dreamer must be careful. Anyone who sees dog feces in his dream may indicate that he will encounter some problems and difficulties in his life during that period and must seek help from God. If one sees dog feces in a dream, this may indicate a financial crisis that the dreamer may face and that he will overcome. Soon. If you see dog droppings, this may indicate changes occurring in the life of the dreamer during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing sleeping dogs in a dream: Seeing dogs sleeping in a dream may indicate getting rid of an enemy you were facing at that time. In the event that you notice the presence of Sleeping dogs in a dream, this may indicate bad changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period. Seeing sleeping dogs may indicate fears that the owner of the dream may face.

title: Interpretation of a dream about losing shoes in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Losing shoes in a dream is one of the visions whose interpretation differed from many interpretive scholars, but the scholar Ibn Sirin explained the interpretation of this dream in an accurate and detailed way according to the dreamer’s condition. Interpretation of the dream of losing shoes in a dream. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of shoes in a dream, saying: The shoe if the dreamer wears it. It is a road and a journey, and whoever cuts his shoelaces has undertaken a journey, but if he cuts his belt, this indicates that. An obstacle that prevents him from traveling against his will. The color of the shoe plays a role in the dreamer’s will to travel, so whoever sees black shoes is looking for money and influence, but if the shoes are red, this is a sign of searching for pleasure, but if the shoes are green, this is a sign of Religion: If the shoes are yellow, this indicates illness and anxiety. Whoever sees in his dream that he has shoes and does not walk in them, this means that they belong to a woman, and if he wears them he will have intercourse with the woman, even if he does not wear them. She is a virgin. If the dreamer sees himself walking with two shoes and takes one off, this indicates his separation from his brother or partner, and wearing shoes and walking with them is a sign of land travel, but if he wears shoes and does not wear them. He walks with them, this indicates that the woman will marry her. Whoever walks with shoes has intercourse with his wife, and as for seeing woolen shoes without taking them, it is a sign of money, and if there are similar ones, it indicates a woman. The dream of losing shoes in a dream is for a man. Whoever sees in his dream that he has put on new hairy sandals, and he does not If someone wears it before, it means that he will marry a virgin, and if her heel is cut, it indicates that she is a woman. Without children, or he will marry a girl without two witnesses, he will marry a girl without a guardian. And if a man sees his shoe on the plate, and the bottom plate is torn and does not fall, this indicates that his wife will give birth to a female, but if the plate sticks to the plate, this symbolizes that the girl’s life will give birth. . It takes a long time, but if the painting falls, this symbolizes the girl’s death. If a man dreams that he is repairing his shoes, this means that he will overcome problems and improve his relationship with his wife, and if someone else repairs his shoes, this symbolizes the corruption of his wife. Ibn Sirin explained that whoever loses his shoe or falls In the water, this means that his wife oversaw a reprehensible matter that leads to death and then surrenders. If the dreamer sees that a man stole his shoes and wore them, this is evidence that this man deceived his wife while he knew it and accepted it. And whoever sees a wooden shoe in a dream, this indicates a traitorous woman. As for the black sole, it means a rich and influential woman, and if the sole is of horse leather, this means that it is of Arab origin, and if it is of cowhide, then it is from non-Arab countries. It has been said that taking off your shoe means safety and achieving the goal, in reference to the verse of God Almighty: (( Take off your shoes. What is the interpretation of losing shoes and then finding them in a dream? Whoever sees in a dream that he lost his shoes and then finds them after hardship, this means that the dreamer will waste money and find them, but after hardship and walking in shoes is a journey of obedience to God and he can appear. My brother, and God knows best. And whoever sees that he is walking alone, but one of them was cut off, and he left him and went, this indicates that the dreamer went out with his brother to the earth, but he left him and returned.
